front.title: Diameter support for EAP Re-authentication Protocol (ERP)

abstract.t: The EAP Re-authentication Protocol (ERP) provides a mechanism to optimize EAP authentication delay in the case of re-authentication, which can be significant in roaming mobile situation. This mechanism assumes that a protocol for Authentication, Authorization and Accounting (AAA) is available to transport ERP between the authenticator(s) and the EAP/ERP server. draft-gaonkar-radext-erp-attrs-03 specifies the transport of ERP using RADIUS. This document specifies the transport of ERP using Diameter.
